content.text:
* Answer a call
  * Call someone in your organization

„Äê32‚Ä† Call people Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Advanced calling options 

Don't use native call settings in the Webex App. Proximus implemented dedicated advanced calls settings within the Webex App to allow automatic synchronisation¬† with the Call Connect Portal.  
To go to this section, follow these steps: 

  1. Click on your initials on the top left side of the screen.  
[Image 0]
  2. Click on Settings  
[Image 1]
  3. Click on Calling  
[Image 2]
  4. Click on Advanced call settings  
[Image 3]

Now you can learn how to:

  * Do not disturb : This activates automatic call forwarding to your voice mail, if it's activated. If voice mail isn't activated, your caller will hear a busy tone. To turn this option on or off in the Webex App. Your choice is automatically saved.
  * Call Forwarding : There are different types of Call Forwarding: 
    * Always Forwarding: all your calls are forwarded to a specified number. This call forwarding always has priority over other call forwarding you have set.
    * No Answer Forwarding: when you don't pick up, your calls are forwarded to a specified number. You can choose the number of rings before a call is forwarded.
    * Busy Forwarding: when your line is busy, your calls are forwarded to a specified number.
In each of the above cases, you can also choose to forward your calls to your voicemail. If you forward calls to your voicemail, you cannot forward them to a specific number at the same time.  
To turn any of these options on or off in the Webex App: 
    1. Choose the desired option.
    2. Enter the phone number to which you want to forward your calls (e.g. 012123456). If you want to forward calls to your voicemail, do not enter a number. Your choice is automatically saved.
  * Simultaneous ringing : Selective Simultaneous Ring ensures that certain phones ring at the same time. You can choose which phone numbers this applies to. If you don't want your employees' phones to start ringing when they're on a call, check Do not ring if on call.
  * Sequential ringing : Selective Sequential Ring ensures that phones ring in a specific order. You can draw up a list with your own order.
  * Remote office : This service allows you to link any number, even if not hosted on our network and all the calls will be forwarded to this destination. Enter a number first. Then To turn this option on or off in the Webex App:¬†  
Check or uncheck Active to turn the option on or off.
  * Call waiting : This allows you to take a second call while you're on the line with another caller.¬†  
To turn this option on or off in the Webex App:¬†Check or uncheck Active to turn the option on or off.
  * Block my caller ID : This hides your phone number when you call someone (secret number).¬†  
To turn this option on or off in the Webex App: Check or uncheck Active to turn the option on or off.

* * *

### Message

With Webex Messaging, connect in real-time or any other time with advanced features for group messaging, file-sharing, whiteboarding, and more.

Send messages 

Learn how to:

  * Read a message
  * Send a message
  * Get back to your drafts
  * Forward messages
  * Get everyone's attention in a space
  * Quotes and threads
  * Format messages
  * Add fun to your messages with emojis
  * Delete messages and files

„Äê33‚Ä† Send message Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Organize your messages 

Learn how to:

  * Find people, spaces, messages, files and devices
  * Filter your @ mentions
  * Filter important messages
  * Get to your favourite spaces more quickly
  * Filter your spaces and content
  * Get back to your drafts
  * Hide less important spaces
  * Follows conversations more easily with threads

„Äê34‚Ä† Organize your messages Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Share your content 

Learn how to:

  * Share Animated GIFs
  * Share Files with Others
  * Share Your Screen While Messaging
  * Share Files from Microsoft OneDrive or SharePoint Online
  * Share Files from Box
  * Create a Whiteboard in a Space

„Äê35‚Ä† Share your content Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

* * *

### Meet

With Webex Meeting, stay connected with video conferencing that‚Äôs engaging, intelligent, and inclusive.

Set up your meeting preferences 

Learn how to: 

  * Change your audio settings
  * Change your video settings
  * Turn off notifications for incoming calls

„Äê36‚Ä† Set up your meeting preferences Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Join meetings 

Learn how to: 

  * Join a Webex Meeting
  * Join a meeting from your Webex site
  * Register for a Webex Meeting or Event
  * Use a virtual background in the Webex Meetings suite

„Äê37‚Ä† Join meetings Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Schedule meetings 

Learn how to: 

  * Start a personal Room meeting
  * Start a meeting from a¬† space
  * Schedule a meeting from a space
  * Schedule a meeting using @webex or @meet

„Äê38‚Ä† Schedule meetings Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Connect to audio and video 

Learn how to: 

  * Mute or unmute other people in a meeting
  * Use a virtual or blurred background in calls and meetings

„Äê39‚Ä† Connect to audio and video Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Share content 

Learn how to: 

  * Share your screen or application in a meeting

„Äê35‚Ä† Share content Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

* * *

### Integrate Webex app to Microsoft Outlook

Improve the collaboration with your contacts by connecting your Microsoft Outlook account to the Webex application.

Connect Microsoft Outlook account to Webex app 

If you use a free Webex account, you can enable the integration in the settings if you are the administrator of your computer. If you use a paid Webex account (Webex for Call Connect, included in your Call Connect license), your administrator must enable the integration for you.

  * View the presence status of your contacts
  * Call your contacts
  * Send your contacts an instant message
  * Shedule and join a Webex meeting

„Äê40‚Ä† Webex integration to Microsoft Outlook Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

„Äê41‚Ä† Connect your user's Webex App status to Outlook Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

## 

‚òÖ ‚òÖ ‚òÖ ‚òÖ ‚òÖ

###  Contact us 

####  Our employees are ready to help you! 

  * Call us on „Äê42‚Ä†0800 55 200‚Ä†tel:+3280055200„Äë  
Administrative questions : Monday - Friday (from 8 a.m. until 6.30 p.m.)  
T

content.text:
„Äê28‚Ä† Set up calling preferences Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Call people 

Learn how to: 

  * Make audio and video calls¬†
  * Answer a call
  * Call someone in your organization

„Äê29‚Ä† Call people Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Advanced calling options 

Don't use native call settings in the Webex App. Proximus implemented dedicated advanced calls settings within the Webex App to allow automatic synchronisation¬† with the Call Connect Portal.  
To go to this section, follow these steps: 

  1. Tap your initials on the top left side of the screen.  
[Image 0]
  2. Tap Settings  
[Image 1]
  3. Tap Calling  
[Image 2]
  4. Tap Advanced call settings  
[Image 3]

Now you can learn how to:

  * Do not disturb : This activates automatic call forwarding to your voice mail, if it's activated. If voice mail isn't activated, your caller will hear a busy tone. To turn this option on or off in the Webex App. Your choice is automatically saved.
  * Call Forwarding : There are different types of Call Forwarding: 
    * Always Forwarding: all your calls are forwarded to a specified number. This call forwarding always has priority over other call forwarding you have set.
    * No Answer Forwarding: when you don't pick up, your calls are forwarded to a specified number. You can choose the number of rings before a call is forwarded.
    * Busy Forwarding: when your line is busy, your calls are forwarded to a specified number.
In each of the above cases, you can also choose to forward your calls to your voicemail. If you forward calls to your voicemail, you cannot forward them to a specific number at the same time.  
To turn any of these options on or off in the Webex App: 
    1. Choose the desired option.
    2. Enter the phone number to which you want to forward your calls (e.g. 012123456). If you want to forward calls to your voicemail, do not enter a number. Your choice is automatically saved.
  * Simultaneous ringing : Selective Simultaneous Ring ensures that certain phones ring at the same time. You can choose which phone numbers this applies to. If you don't want your employees' phones to start ringing when they're on a call, check Do not ring if on call.
  * Sequential ringing : Selective Sequential Ring ensures that phones ring in a specific order. You can draw up a list with your own order.
  * Remote office : This service allows you to link any number, even if not hosted on our network and all the calls will be forwarded to this destination. Enter a number first. Then To turn this option on or off in the Webex App:¬†  
Check or uncheck Active to turn the option on or off.
  * Call waiting : This allows you to take a second call while you're on the line with another caller.¬†  
To turn this option on or off in the Webex App:¬†Check or uncheck Active to turn the option on or off.
  * Block my caller ID : This hides your phone number when you call someone (secret number).¬†  
To turn this option on or off in the Webex App: Check or uncheck Active to turn the option on or off.

* * *

### Message

With Webex Messaging, connect in real-time or any other time with advanced features for group messaging, file-sharing, whiteboarding, and more.

Send messages 

Learn how to:

  * Read a message
  * Send a message
  * Get back to your drafts
  * Forward messages
  * Get everyone's attention in a space
  * Quotes and threads
  * Format messages
  * Add fun to your messages with emojis
  * Delete messages and files

„Äê30‚Ä† Send message Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Organize your messages 

Learn how to:

  * Find people, spaces, messages, files and devices
  * Filter your @ mentions
  * Filter important messages
  * Get to your favourite spaces more quickly
  * Filter your spaces and content
  * Get back to your drafts
  * Hide less important spaces
  * Follows conversations more easily with threads

„Äê31‚Ä† Organize your messages Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Share your content 

Learn how to:

  * Share Animated GIFs
  * Share Files with Others
  * Share Your Screen While Messaging
  * Share Files from Microsoft OneDrive or SharePoint Online
  * Share Files from Box
  * Create a Whiteboard in a Space

„Äê32‚Ä† Share your content Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

* * *

### Meet

With Webex Meeting, stay connected with video conferencing that‚Äôs engaging, intelligent, and inclusive.

Set up your meeting preferences 

Learn how to: 

  * Change your audio settings
  * Change your video settings
  * Turn off notifications for incoming calls

„Äê33‚Ä† Set up your meeting preferences Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Join meetings 

Learn how to: 

  * Join a Webex Meeting
  * Join a meeting from your Webex site
  * Register for a Webex Meeting or Event
  * Use a virtual background in the Webex Meetings suite

„Äê34‚Ä† Join meetings Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Connect to audio and video 

Learn how to: 

  * Mute or unmute other people in a meeting
  * Use a virtual or blurred background in calls and meetings

„Äê35‚Ä† Connect to audio and video Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Share content 

Learn how to: 

  * Share your screen or application in a meeting

„Äê32‚Ä† Share content Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

* * *

### Integrate Webex app to Microsoft Outlook

Improve the collaboration with your contacts by connecting your Microsoft Outlook account to the Webex application.

Connect Microsoft Outlook account to Webex app 

If you use a free Webex account, you can enable the integration in the settings if you are the administrator of your computer. If you use a paid Webex account (Webex for Call Connect, included in your Call Connect license), your administrator must enable the integration for you.

  * View the presence status of your contacts
  * Call your contacts
  * Send your contacts an instant message
  * Shedule and join a Webex meeting

„Äê36‚Ä† Webex integration to Microsoft Outlook Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

„Äê37‚Ä† Connect your user's Webex App status to Outlook Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

* * *

## 

‚òÖ ‚òÖ ‚òÖ ‚òÖ ‚òÖ

###  Contact 

####  Our Bizz Experts are at your disposal. Choose your contact mode. 

>Close

parts:
Pour r√©pondre √† tes questions concernant **Bizz Call Connect** de Proximus et l'utilisation d'un **SIP Trunk**, voici quelques clarifications bas√©es sur les informations actuelles :

### 1. **SIP Trunk et Bizz Call Connect :**
   - **Bizz Call Connect** est une solution qui te permet de g√©rer les appels via un num√©ro principal (comme le num√©ro de l'asbl) tout en redirigeant les appels vers plusieurs utilisateurs, sur leurs t√©l√©phones mobiles ou lignes fixes. Cela fonctionne comme une sorte de **central t√©l√©phonique virtuel** h√©berg√© par Proximus.
   - Contrairement √† un **SIP Trunk** classique (qui est g√©n√©ralement un service s√©par√© utilis√© pour connecter un PBX √† l'ext√©rieur), **Bizz Call Connect** est plus simple et est int√©gr√© directement dans leur solution cloud. Il te permet d'utiliser des fonctions avanc√©es comme la redirection, les groupes d'appels, et m√™me l'int√©gration avec **Webex** pour la visioconf√©rence et la gestion des appels„Äê56‚Ä†source„Äë„Äê58‚Ä†source„Äë.
   - Donc, **Bizz Call Connect n'est pas exactement un SIP Trunk**, mais il fonctionne comme une alternative plus simple pour les petites entreprises, sans avoir √† configurer un syst√®me PBX complexe comme 3CX avec un SIP Trunk s√©par√©.

### 2. **Fonctionnalit√©s et co√ªt :**
   - Avec **Bizz Call Connect**, tu peux obtenir toutes les fonctionnalit√©s de gestion des appels via une seule interface, accessible depuis un **portail web** ou l‚Äôapplication **Webex**. Cela inclut la possibilit√© de rediriger les appels vers les mobiles des employ√©s, de transf√©rer des appels, d'utiliser des files d'attente, et bien plus encore.
   - En termes de co√ªt, ta coll√®gue a raison : **Proximus facture environ 20 √† 25 ‚Ç¨/mois** pour cette solution, quel que soit le nombre d'utilisateurs, ce qui peut √™tre beaucoup plus √©conomique qu'un SIP Trunk traditionnel„Äê56‚Ä†source„Äë„Äê57‚Ä†source„Äë.

### 3. **Webex vs 3CX :**
   - **Webex**, fourni avec Bizz Call Connect, est essentiellement une plateforme de collaboration qui inclut des fonctionnalit√©s d'appel, de messagerie et de visioconf√©rence. Cela permet une gestion des appels similaire √† 3CX, mais int√©gr√©e directement avec l'infrastructure de Proximus. **Webex** n'est pas un PBX comme 3CX, mais plut√¥t une solution unifi√©e qui combine t√©l√©phonie et collaboration„Äê57‚Ä†source„Äë„Äê59‚Ä†source„Äë.
   - **3CX**, quant √† lui, est un **syst√®me PBX** complet que tu dois g√©rer toi-m√™me, souvent avec un **SIP Trunk** pour passer des appels externes. **Webex** est plus une solution pr√™te √† l'emploi pour les petites entreprises, tandis que **3CX** offre plus de flexibilit√© et de personnalisation si tu veux avoir un contr√¥le total.

En r√©sum√©, **Bizz Call Connect** avec **Webex** est une solution pratique qui peut te permettre de g√©rer les appels de ton asbl sans avoir √† configurer un **SIP Trunk** avec 3CX. C'est une alternative plus simple et potentiellement moins co√ªteuse pour tes besoins.

metadata.title: Bizz Call Connect - manage your company's calls | Proximus
metadata.text:
* Stay reachable, even while on the go
  * Make unlimited calls*

„Äê28‚Ä† Talk to an expert „Äë 

## Manage your business calls as you wish

[Image 0] 

Simultaneous calls

Your team can make and receive unlimited calls* through a landline number, all while having personal numbers.

[Image 1] 

Transfer, Forwarding, and Voicemail

You're in control. Redirect calls to another landline, a mobile, or your voicemail.

[Image 2] 

Professional greeting

Provide a tailored experience with a welcoming message, interactive menu, waiting music...

## The smart system for handling your business calls

#### With Bizz Call Connect, you won't miss any call

  * From your employees' landlines and mobile devices
  * Access all the functionalities of a telephone exchange
  * Easy management through a web portal or mobile app
  * Flexibility: add or remove users very easily

* * *

#### Not a packs customer yet?

If you want to benefit from the Bizz Call Connect option, compose your Business pack

* * *

Option for Business Pack starting from

‚Ç¨25/month

„Äê29‚Ä†Request a quote„Äë

Non binding subscription

Secured payment

Close the overlayer 

## Why buy online

### Non-binding subscription

  * Modify or cancel whenever you want
  * For free

* * *

### 100% secure payment

  * Choose between several payment methods:  
[Image 3: Visa] [Image 4: Mastercard] [Image 5: Bancontact] [Image 6: Maestro]
  * Possibility for (bi)-monthly invoice depending of ordered online product

* * *

„Äê30‚Ä†Do you need the aftersale service?„Äë

#### How does Bizz Call Connect work?

 See more See less

#### How does Bizz Call Connect work?

An example: Peter and Mary are architects and share the same office.

They have a general number which they give out to their customers and use in their communication (business card, website, advertising, etc.). If a customer dials this number, the call will simultaneously arrive on both Peter and Mary‚Äôs landline. If they are on a construction site, the call will be diverted to their mobile phone.

On the construction site when Mary and Peter call a customer from their mobile, it's the landline number that will be displayed. In this way, their mobile phone numbers remain private.

On Tuesdays, Mary is always in the office.

To avoid disturbing Peter, all calls arrive on Mary's landline phone only.

Outside office hours, a welcome message is played back to customers. They can leave any messages on an answering machine.

[Image 7]

Bizz Call Connect

As from ‚Ç¨25 /month + free installation

„Äê31‚Ä†Request a quote„Äë 

## How does the installation work?

### Free installation

A technician will call in at no charge to install the Bizz Call Connect solution and the associated equipment. He will take care of the basic setup and help you familiarize with the phones, the app and the portal.

[Image 8] 

#### Limit your investments and rent IP phones

You don't have to invest in hardware. You can rent IP phones from Proximus.

„Äê32‚Ä† Discover the phones Opens a new window „Äë 

 Conditions 

  * „Äê33‚Ä† General conditions „Äë 
  * „Äê34‚Ä† Promotion conditions „Äë 

The „Äê35‚Ä†Terms and Conditions„Äë and „Äê36‚Ä†Pricelist & tariffs„Äë apply.

A Proximus VDSL2 Internet line is required to use Bizz Call Connect.  
*Unlimited national calls with Business Flex : *Unlimited national calls to landline numbers and 1,000 minutes per month to mobile numbers, valid from one fixed number.  
If you call for more than 1,000 minutes, you pay a special rate. Calls 24/7, except to special numbers (voting, 0900, etc.).  
*Unlimited international calls: from your landline, 1,000 minutes for calling landline and mobile numbers in 37 countries (Andorra, Bulgaria, Canada, Cyprus, Denmark, Germany, Estonia, Faroe Islands, Finland, France, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Iceland, Italy, Croatia, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Monaco, Netherlands, Norway, Austria, Poland, Portugal, Romania, San Marino, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Czech Republic, United Kingdom, United States, Sweden, and Switzerland). Only to landline numbers in Morocco and Turkey. If you exceed the 1,000 minutes or call other countries, you pay a special rate of -50% instead of the standard rate (Classic).

If you opt for a Business Flex plan, the ¬´ Bizz Switch ¬ª product is automatically removed from your pack as all its features are included in Bizz Call Connect. When a Bizz Call Connect solution or Multi Line is added to ¬† Business Flex , the included traditional telephone line (PSTN) will be automatically replaced by an IP line. metadata.text:
* Stay reachable, even while on the go
  * Make unlimited calls*

„Äê28‚Ä† Talk to an expert „Äë 

## Manage your business calls as you wish

[Image 0] 

Simultaneous calls

Your team can make and receive unlimited calls* through a landline number, all while having personal numbers.

[Image 1] 

Transfer, Forwarding, and Voicemail

You're in control. Redirect calls to another landline, a mobile, or your voicemail.

[Image 2] 

Professional greeting

Provide a tailored experience with a welcoming message, interactive menu, waiting music...

## The smart system for handling your business calls

#### With Bizz Call Connect, you won't miss any call

  * From your employees' landlines and mobile devices
  * Access all the functionalities of a telephone exchange
  * Easy management through a web portal or mobile app
  * Flexibility: add or remove users very easily

* * *

#### Not a packs customer yet?

If you want to benefit from the Bizz Call Connect option, compose your Business pack

* * *

Option for Business Pack starting from

‚Ç¨25/month

„Äê29‚Ä†Request a quote„Äë

Non binding subscription

Secured payment

Close the overlayer 

## Why buy online

### Non-binding subscription

  * Modify or cancel whenever you want
  * For free

* * *

### 100% secure payment

  * Choose between several payment methods:  
[Image 3: Visa] [Image 4: Mastercard] [Image 5: Bancontact] [Image 6: Maestro]
  * Possibility for (bi)-monthly invoice depending of ordered online product

* * *

„Äê30‚Ä†Do you need the aftersale service?„Äë

#### How does Bizz Call Connect work?

 See more See less

#### How does Bizz Call Connect work?

An example: Peter and Mary are architects and share the same office.

They have a general number which they give out to their customers and use in their communication (business card, website, advertising, etc.). If a customer dials this number, the call will simultaneously arrive on both Peter and Mary‚Äôs landline. If they are on a construction site, the call will be diverted to their mobile phone.

On the construction site when Mary and Peter call a customer from their mobile, it's the landline number that will be displayed. In this way, their mobile phone numbers remain private.

On Tuesdays, Mary is always in the office.

To avoid disturbing Peter, all calls arrive on Mary's landline phone only.

Outside office hours, a welcome message is played back to customers. They can leave any messages on an answering machine.

[Image 7]

Bizz Call Connect

As from ‚Ç¨25 /month + free installation

„Äê31‚Ä†Request a quote„Äë 

## How does the installation work?

### Free installation

A technician will call in at no charge to install the Bizz Call Connect solution and the associated equipment. He will take care of the basic setup and help you familiarize with the phones, the app and the portal.

[Image 8] 

#### Limit your investments and rent IP phones

You don't have to invest in hardware. You can rent IP phones from Proximus.

„Äê32‚Ä† Discover the phones Opens a new window „Äë 

 Conditions 

  * „Äê33‚Ä† General conditions „Äë 
  * „Äê34‚Ä† Promotion conditions „Äë 

The „Äê35‚Ä†Terms and Conditions„Äë and „Äê36‚Ä†Pricelist & tariffs„Äë apply.

A Proximus VDSL2 Internet line is required to use Bizz Call Connect.  
*Unlimited national calls with Business Flex : *Unlimited national calls to landline numbers and 1,000 minutes per month to mobile numbers, valid from one fixed number.  
If you call for more than 1,000 minutes, you pay a special rate. Calls 24/7, except to special numbers (voting, 0900, etc.).  
*Unlimited international calls: from your landline, 1,000 minutes for calling landline and mobile numbers in 37 countries (Andorra, Bulgaria, Canada, Cyprus, Denmark, Germany, Estonia, Faroe Islands, Finland, France, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Iceland, Italy, Croatia, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Monaco, Netherlands, Norway, Austria, Poland, Portugal, Romania, San Marino, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Czech Republic, United Kingdom, United States, Sweden, and Switzerland). Only to landline numbers in Morocco and Turkey. If you exceed the 1,000 minutes or call other countries, you pay a special rate of -50% instead of the standard rate (Classic).

If you opt for a Business Flex plan, the ¬´ Bizz Switch ¬ª product is automatically removed from your pack as all its features are included in Bizz Call Connect. When a Bizz Call Connect solution or Multi Line is added to ¬† Business Flex , the included traditional telephone line (PSTN) will be automatically replaced by an IP line. NB: some alarms are not compatible with the IP line. Please contact your vendor for more information.

Promo Free installation (instead of ‚Ç¨ 350) valid from 01 July 2019 to 31 December 2024 for the installation and configuration costs of the licenses and for travel costs, but does not include the cost of installing options, extra indoor cabling, any specific on-site work required, and the cost of installing the lines and Internet.

metadata.title: Use the Webex app for Call Connect | Proximus
metadata.text:
* Answer a call
  * Call someone in your organization

„Äê32‚Ä† Call people Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Advanced calling options 

Don't use native call settings in the Webex App. Proximus implemented dedicated advanced calls settings within the Webex App to allow automatic synchronisation¬† with the Call Connect Portal.  
To go to this section, follow these steps: 

  1. Click on your initials on the top left side of the screen.  
[Image 0]
  2. Click on Settings  
[Image 1]
  3. Click on Calling  
[Image 2]
  4. Click on Advanced call settings  
[Image 3]

Now you can learn how to:

  * Do not disturb : This activates automatic call forwarding to your voice mail, if it's activated. If voice mail isn't activated, your caller will hear a busy tone. To turn this option on or off in the Webex App. Your choice is automatically saved.
  * Call Forwarding : There are different types of Call Forwarding: 
    * Always Forwarding: all your calls are forwarded to a specified number. This call forwarding always has priority over other call forwarding you have set.
    * No Answer Forwarding: when you don't pick up, your calls are forwarded to a specified number. You can choose the number of rings before a call is forwarded.
    * Busy Forwarding: when your line is busy, your calls are forwarded to a specified number.
In each of the above cases, you can also choose to forward your calls to your voicemail. If you forward calls to your voicemail, you cannot forward them to a specific number at the same time.  
To turn any of these options on or off in the Webex App: 
    1. Choose the desired option.
    2. Enter the phone number to which you want to forward your calls (e.g. 012123456). If you want to forward calls to your voicemail, do not enter a number. Your choice is automatically saved.
  * Simultaneous ringing : Selective Simultaneous Ring ensures that certain phones ring at the same time. You can choose which phone numbers this applies to. If you don't want your employees' phones to start ringing when they're on a call, check Do not ring if on call.
  * Sequential ringing : Selective Sequential Ring ensures that phones ring in a specific order. You can draw up a list with your own order.
  * Remote office : This service allows you to link any number, even if not hosted on our network and all the calls will be forwarded to this destination. Enter a number first. Then To turn this option on or off in the Webex App:¬†  
Check or uncheck Active to turn the option on or off.
  * Call waiting : This allows you to take a second call while you're on the line with another caller.¬†  
To turn this option on or off in the Webex App:¬†Check or uncheck Active to turn the option on or off.
  * Block my caller ID : This hides your phone number when you call someone (secret number).¬†  
To turn this option on or off in the Webex App: Check or uncheck Active to turn the option on or off.

* * *

### Message

With Webex Messaging, connect in real-time or any other time with advanced features for group messaging, file-sharing, whiteboarding, and more.

Send messages 

Learn how to:

  * Read a message
  * Send a message
  * Get back to your drafts
  * Forward messages
  * Get everyone's attention in a space
  * Quotes and threads
  * Format messages
  * Add fun to your messages with emojis
  * Delete messages and files

„Äê33‚Ä† Send message Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Organize your messages 

Learn how to:

  * Find people, spaces, messages, files and devices
  * Filter your @ mentions
  * Filter important messages
  * Get to your favourite spaces more quickly
  * Filter your spaces and content
  * Get back to your drafts
  * Hide less important spaces
  * Follows conversations more easily with threads

„Äê34‚Ä† Organize your messages Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Share your content 

Learn how to:

  * Share Animated GIFs
  * Share Files with Others
  * Share Your Screen While Messaging
  * Share Files from Microsoft OneDrive or SharePoint Online
  * Share Files from Box
  * Create a Whiteboard in a Space

„Äê35‚Ä† Share your content Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

* * *

### Meet

With Webex Meeting, stay connected with video conferencing that‚Äôs engaging, intelligent, and inclusive.

Set up your meeting preferences 

Learn how to: 

  * Change your audio settings
  * Change your video settings
  * Turn off notifications for incoming calls

„Äê36‚Ä† Set up your meeting preferences Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Join meetings 

Learn how to: 

  * Join a Webex Meeting
  * Join a meeting from your Webex site
  * Register for a Webex Meeting or Event
  * Use a virtual background in the Webex Meetings suite

„Äê37‚Ä† Join meetings Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Schedule meetings 

Learn how to: 

  * Start a personal Room meeting
  * Start a meeting from a¬† space
  * Schedule a meeting from a space
  * Schedule a meeting using @webex or @meet

„Äê38‚Ä† Schedule meetings Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Connect to audio and video 

Learn how to: 

  * Mute or unmute other people in a meeting
  * Use a virtual or blurred background in calls and meetings

„Äê39‚Ä† Connect to audio and video Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Share content 

Learn how to: 

  * Share your screen or application in a meeting

„Äê35‚Ä† Share content Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

* * *

### Integrate Webex app to Microsoft Outlook

Improve the collaboration with your contacts by connecting your Microsoft Outlook account to the Webex application.

Connect Microsoft Outlook account to Webex app 

If you use a free Webex account, you can enable the integration in the settings if you are the administrator of your computer. If you use a paid Webex account (Webex for Call Connect, included in your Call Connect license), your administrator must enable the integration for you.

  * View the presence status of your contacts
  * Call your contacts
  * Send your contacts an instant message
  * Shedule and join a Webex meeting

„Äê40‚Ä† Webex integration to Microsoft Outlook Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

„Äê41‚Ä† Connect your user's Webex App status to Outlook Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

## 

‚òÖ ‚òÖ ‚òÖ ‚òÖ ‚òÖ

###  Contact us 

####  Our employees are ready to help you! 

  * Call us on „Äê42‚Ä†0800 55 200‚Ä†tel:+3280055200„Äë  
Administrative questions : Monday - Friday (from 8 a.m. until 6.30 p.m.)  
T

metadata.title: Use the Webex app for Call Connect | Proximus
metadata.text:
„Äê28‚Ä† Set up calling preferences Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Call people 

Learn how to: 

  * Make audio and video calls¬†
  * Answer a call
  * Call someone in your organization

„Äê29‚Ä† Call people Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Advanced calling options 

Don't use native call settings in the Webex App. Proximus implemented dedicated advanced calls settings within the Webex App to allow automatic synchronisation¬† with the Call Connect Portal.  
To go to this section, follow these steps: 

  1. Tap your initials on the top left side of the screen.  
[Image 0]
  2. Tap Settings  
[Image 1]
  3. Tap Calling  
[Image 2]
  4. Tap Advanced call settings  
[Image 3]

Now you can learn how to:

  * Do not disturb : This activates automatic call forwarding to your voice mail, if it's activated. If voice mail isn't activated, your caller will hear a busy tone. To turn this option on or off in the Webex App. Your choice is automatically saved.
  * Call Forwarding : There are different types of Call Forwarding: 
    * Always Forwarding: all your calls are forwarded to a specified number. This call forwarding always has priority over other call forwarding you have set.
    * No Answer Forwarding: when you don't pick up, your calls are forwarded to a specified number. You can choose the number of rings before a call is forwarded.
    * Busy Forwarding: when your line is busy, your calls are forwarded to a specified number.
In each of the above cases, you can also choose to forward your calls to your voicemail. If you forward calls to your voicemail, you cannot forward them to a specific number at the same time.  
To turn any of these options on or off in the Webex App: 
    1. Choose the desired option.
    2. Enter the phone number to which you want to forward your calls (e.g. 012123456). If you want to forward calls to your voicemail, do not enter a number. Your choice is automatically saved.
  * Simultaneous ringing : Selective Simultaneous Ring ensures that certain phones ring at the same time. You can choose which phone numbers this applies to. If you don't want your employees' phones to start ringing when they're on a call, check Do not ring if on call.
  * Sequential ringing : Selective Sequential Ring ensures that phones ring in a specific order. You can draw up a list with your own order.
  * Remote office : This service allows you to link any number, even if not hosted on our network and all the calls will be forwarded to this destination. Enter a number first. Then To turn this option on or off in the Webex App:¬†  
Check or uncheck Active to turn the option on or off.
  * Call waiting : This allows you to take a second call while you're on the line with another caller.¬†  
To turn this option on or off in the Webex App:¬†Check or uncheck Active to turn the option on or off.
  * Block my caller ID : This hides your phone number when you call someone (secret number).¬†  
To turn this option on or off in the Webex App: Check or uncheck Active to turn the option on or off.

* * *

### Message

With Webex Messaging, connect in real-time or any other time with advanced features for group messaging, file-sharing, whiteboarding, and more.

Send messages 

Learn how to:

  * Read a message
  * Send a message
  * Get back to your drafts
  * Forward messages
  * Get everyone's attention in a space
  * Quotes and threads
  * Format messages
  * Add fun to your messages with emojis
  * Delete messages and files

„Äê30‚Ä† Send message Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë

  * Follows conversations more easily with threads

Share your content

  * Share Animated GIFs

  * Share Files from Microsoft OneDrive or SharePoint Online
  * Share Files from Box
  * Create a Whiteboard in a Space

„Äê32‚Ä† Share your content Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë

## Manage your business calls as you wish

[Image 0] 

Simultaneous calls

Your team can make and receive unlimited calls* through a landline number, all while having personal numbers.

[Image 1] 

Transfer, Forwarding, and Voicemail

You're in control. Redirect calls to another landline, a mobile, or your voicemail.

Professional greeting

## The smart system for handling your business calls

#### With Bizz Call Connect, you won't miss any call

  * From your employees' landlines and mobile devices
  * Access all the functionalities of a telephone exchange
  * Easy management through a web portal or mobile app
  * Flexibility: add or remove users very easily

„Äê30‚Ä†Do you need the aftersale service?„Äë

#### How does Bizz Call Connect work?

 See more See less

#### How does Bizz Call Connect work?

An example: Peter and Mary are architects and share the same office.

They have a general number which they give out to their customers and use in their communication (business card, website, advertising, etc.). If a customer dials this number, the call will simultaneously arrive on both Peter and Mary‚Äôs landline. If they are on a construction site, the call will be diverted to their mobile phone.

On the construction site when Mary and Peter call a customer from their mobile, it's the landline number that will be displayed. In this way, their mobile phone numbers remain private.

On Tuesdays, Mary is always in the office.

To avoid disturbing Peter, all calls arrive on Mary's landline phone only.

Outside office hours, a welcome message is played back to customers. They can leave any messages on an answering machine.

[Image 7]

Bizz Call Connect

As from ‚Ç¨25 /month + free installation

„Äê31‚Ä†Request a quote„Äë 

## How does the installation work?

### Free installation

A technician will call in at no charge to install the Bizz Call Connect solution and the associated equipment. He will take care of the basic setup and help you familiarize with the phones, the app and the portal.

[Image 8] 

#### Limit your investments and rent IP phones

You don't have to invest in hardware. You can rent IP phones from Proximus.

„Äê32‚Ä† Discover the phones Opens a new window „Äë 

 Conditions 

  * „Äê33‚Ä† General conditions „Äë 
  * „Äê34‚Ä† Promotion conditions „Äë 

The „Äê35‚Ä†Terms and Conditions„Äë and „Äê36‚Ä†Pricelist & tariffs„Äë apply.

A Proximus VDSL2 Internet line is required to use Bizz Call Connect.  
*Unlimited national calls with Business Flex : *Unlimited national calls to landline numbers and 1,000 minutes per month to mobile numbers, valid from one fixed number.  
If you call for more than 1,000 minutes, you pay a special rate. Calls 24/7, except to special numbers (voting, 0900, etc.).  
*Unlimited international calls: from your landline, 1,000 minutes for calling landline and mobile numbers in 37 countries (Andorra, Bulgaria, Canada, Cyprus, Denmark, Germany, Estonia, Faroe Islands, Finland, France, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Iceland, Italy, Croatia, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Monaco, Netherlands, Norway, Austria, Poland, Portugal, Romania, San Marino, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Czech Republic, United Kingdom, United States, Sweden, and Switzerland). Only to landline numbers in Morocco and Turkey. If you exceed the 1,000 minutes or call other countries, you pay a special rate of -50% instead of the standard rate (Classic).

If you opt for a Business Flex plan, the ¬´ Bizz Switch ¬ª product is automatically removed from your pack as all its features are included in Bizz Call Connect. When a Bizz Call Connect solution or Multi Line is added to ¬† Business Flex , the included traditional telephone line (PSTN) will be automatically replaced by an IP line. NB: some alarms are not compatible with the IP line. Please contact your vendor for more information.

Promo Free installation (instead of ‚Ç¨ 350) valid from 01 July 2019 to 31 December 2024 for the installation and configuration costs of the licenses and for travel costs, but does not include the cost of installing options, extra indoor cabling, any specific on-site work required, and the cost of installing the lines and Internet.

Close the overlayer

##  

With the Webex app, you can not only handle your landline calls on your smartphone, but also improve your workflows and stay connected thanks to a complete suite of team collaboration features (calls, voicemail, meetings and integration).

content_references.snippet:
* Answer a call
  * Call someone in your organization

„Äê32‚Ä† Call people Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Advanced calling options 

Don't use native call settings in the Webex App. Proximus implemented dedicated advanced calls settings within the Webex App to allow automatic synchronisation¬† with the Call Connect Portal.  
To go to this section, follow these steps: 

  1. Click on your initials on the top left side of the screen.  
[Image 0]
  2. Click on Settings  
[Image 1]
  3. Click on Calling  
[Image 2]
  4. Click on Advanced call settings  
[Image 3]

Now you can learn how to:

  * Do not disturb : This activates automatic call forwarding to your voice mail, if it's activated. If voice mail isn't activated, your caller will hear a busy tone. To turn this option on or off in the Webex App. Your choice is automatically saved.
  * Call Forwarding : There are different types of Call Forwarding: 
    * Always Forwarding: all your calls are forwarded to a specified number. This call forwarding always has priority over other call forwarding you have set.
    * No Answer Forwarding: when you don't pick up, your calls are forwarded to a specified number. You can choose the number of rings before a call is forwarded.
    * Busy Forwarding: when your line is busy, your calls are forwarded to a specified number.
In each of the above cases, you can also choose to forward your calls to your voicemail. If you forward calls to your voicemail, you cannot forward them to a specific number at the same time.  
To turn any of these options on or off in the Webex App: 
    1. Choose the desired option.
    2. Enter the phone number to which you want to forward your calls (e.g. 012123456). If you want to forward calls to your voicemail, do not enter a number. Your choice is automatically saved.
  * Simultaneous ringing : Selective Simultaneous Ring ensures that certain phones ring at the same time. You can choose which phone numbers this applies to. If you don't want your employees' phones to start ringing when they're on a call, check Do not ring if on call.
  * Sequential ringing : Selective Sequential Ring ensures that phones ring in a specific order. You can draw up a list with your own order.
  * Remote office : This service allows you to link any number, even if not hosted on our network and all the calls will be forwarded to this destination. Enter a number first. Then To turn this option on or off in the Webex App:¬†  
Check or uncheck Active to turn the option on or off.
  * Call waiting : This allows you to take a second call while you're on the line with another caller.¬†  
To turn this option on or off in the Webex App:¬†Check or uncheck Active to turn the option on or off.
  * Block my caller ID : This hides your phone number when you call someone (secret number).¬†  
To turn this option on or off in the Webex App: Check or uncheck Active to turn the option on or off.

* * *

### Message

With Webex Messaging, connect in real-time or any other time with advanced features for group messaging, file-sharing, whiteboarding, and more.

Send messages 

Learn how to:

  * Read a message
  * Send a message
  * Get back to your drafts
  * Forward messages
  * Get everyone's attention in a space
  * Quotes and threads
  * Format messages
  * Add fun to your messages with emojis
  * Delete messages and files

„Äê33‚Ä† Send message Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Organize your messages 

Learn how to:

  * Find people, spaces, messages, files and devices
  * Filter your @ mentions
  * Filter important messages
  * Get to your favourite spaces more quickly
  * Filter your spaces and content
  * Get back to your drafts
  * Hide less important spaces
  * Follows conversations more easily with threads

„Äê34‚Ä† Organize your messages Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Share your content 

Learn how to:

  * Share Animated GIFs
  * Share Files with Others
  * Share Your Screen While Messaging
  * Share Files from Microsoft OneDrive or SharePoint Online
  * Share Files from Box
  * Create a Whiteboard in a Space

„Äê35‚Ä† Share your content Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

* * *

### Meet

With Webex Meeting, stay connected with video conferencing that‚Äôs engaging, intelligent, and inclusive.

Set up your meeting preferences 

Learn how to: 

  * Change your audio settings
  * Change your video settings
  * Turn off notifications for incoming calls

„Äê36‚Ä† Set up your meeting preferences Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Join meetings 

Learn how to: 

  * Join a Webex Meeting
  * Join a meeting from your Webex site
  * Register for a Webex Meeting or Event
  * Use a virtual background in the Webex Meetings suite

„Äê37‚Ä† Join meetings Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Schedule meetings 

Learn how to: 

  * Start a personal Room meeting
  * Start a meeting from a¬† space
  * Schedule a meeting from a space
  * Schedule a meeting using @webex or @meet

„Äê38‚Ä† Schedule meetings Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Connect to audio and video 

Learn how to: 

  * Mute or unmute other people in a meeting
  * Use a virtual or blurred background in calls and meetings

„Äê39‚Ä† Connect to audio and video Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Share content 

Learn how to: 

  * Share your screen or application in a meeting

„Äê35‚Ä† Share content Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

* * *

### Integrate Webex app to Microsoft Outlook

Improve the collaboration with your contacts by connecting your Microsoft Outlook account to the Webex application.

Connect Microsoft Outlook account to Webex app 

If you use a free Webex account, you can enable the integration in the settings if you are the administrator of your computer. If you use a paid Webex account (Webex for Call Connect, included in your Call Connect license), your administrator must enable the integration for you.

  * View the presence status of your contacts
  * Call your contacts
  * Send your contacts an instant message
  * Shedule and join a Webex meeting

Ok, et comme a priori tu n'as pas trouver d'informations concernant la possibilit√© en tant que client Business d'avoir juste un trunk SIP chez Proximus, qui aurait pu √™tre moins cher ?!

Et que dans l'optique d'avoir rapidement un syst√®me simple pour les coll√®gues qui ne maitrise pas l'ICT, et qui ne trouveront pas aussi stimulant que moi de devoir d√©couvrir et param√©trer 3CX. Tu pense que la solution package de Proximus Biz Call Connect + Webex est la plus sens√©e ?

Il semble que Proximus ne mette pas en avant d'offres sp√©cifiques pour un **SIP Trunk seul** pour ses clients Business, en dehors de solutions packag√©es comme **Bizz Call Connect**. D'apr√®s mes recherches, la plupart des solutions disponibles chez Proximus sont orient√©es vers des offres compl√®tes qui incluent la gestion des appels avec des fonctionnalit√©s avanc√©es, telles que celles propos√©es par **Bizz Call Connect**.

### Concernant la solution **Bizz Call Connect + Webex** :

Cette solution pourrait effectivement √™tre la plus **sens√©e** pour tes besoins et ceux de ton √©quipe, pour plusieurs raisons :

1. **Facilit√© d'utilisation** : Tes coll√®gues n'auront pas besoin de ma√Ætriser l'ICT ou de configurer des syst√®mes complexes comme **3CX**. L'interface de **Bizz Call Connect** via le portail web et l'application **Webex** est con√ßue pour √™tre conviviale et simple √† utiliser„Äê56‚Ä†source„Äë„Äê57‚Ä†source„Äë.

2. **Co√ªt** : √Ä environ **20 √† 25 ‚Ç¨/mois** pour un nombre illimit√© d'utilisateurs, c'est une solution √©conomique compar√©e √† un setup plus complexe avec **3CX** et un **SIP Trunk**. En choisissant cette option, tu √©conomises sur les co√ªts suppl√©mentaires li√©s √† la gestion d'une infrastructure PBX sur mesure„Äê56‚Ä†source„Äë.

3. **Fonctionnalit√©s incluses** : La solution int√®gre plusieurs fonctionnalit√©s utiles telles que la gestion des appels, le transfert, les messages vocaux, la redirection des appels, et la collaboration via **Webex** (visioconf√©rences, messagerie instantan√©e, etc.). Tout cela est g√©r√© √† partir d'une seule plateforme, ce qui simplifie grandement la gestion pour tes coll√®gues„Äê58‚Ä†source„Äë„Äê59‚Ä†source„Äë.

### Conclusion :
Pour un **syst√®me simple et rapidement op√©rationnel**, avec un co√ªt ma√Ætris√© et une facilit√© d'utilisation pour tes coll√®gues, la solution **Bizz Call Connect + Webex** semble √™tre la meilleure option. Elle t'√©vite les tracas techniques li√©s √† l'installation et √† la configuration d'un syst√®me PBX comme **3CX**, tout en offrant les fonctionnalit√©s n√©cessaires pour une petite √©quipe.

metadata.title: Bizz Call Connect - manage your company's calls | Proximus
metadata.text:
* Stay reachable, even while on the go
  * Make unlimited calls*

„Äê28‚Ä† Talk to an expert „Äë 

## Manage your business calls as you wish

[Image 0] 

Simultaneous calls

Your team can make and receive unlimited calls* through a landline number, all while having personal numbers.

[Image 1] 

Transfer, Forwarding, and Voicemail

You're in control. Redirect calls to another landline, a mobile, or your voicemail.

[Image 2] 

Professional greeting

Provide a tailored experience with a welcoming message, interactive menu, waiting music...

## The smart system for handling your business calls

#### With Bizz Call Connect, you won't miss any call

  * From your employees' landlines and mobile devices
  * Access all the functionalities of a telephone exchange
  * Easy management through a web portal or mobile app
  * Flexibility: add or remove users very easily

* * *

#### Not a packs customer yet?

If you want to benefit from the Bizz Call Connect option, compose your Business pack

* * *

Option for Business Pack starting from

‚Ç¨25/month

„Äê29‚Ä†Request a quote„Äë

Non binding subscription

Secured payment

Close the overlayer 

## Why buy online

### Non-binding subscription

  * Modify or cancel whenever you want
  * For free

* * *

### 100% secure payment

  * Choose between several payment methods:  
[Image 3: Visa] [Image 4: Mastercard] [Image 5: Bancontact] [Image 6: Maestro]
  * Possibility for (bi)-monthly invoice depending of ordered online product

* * *

„Äê30‚Ä†Do you need the aftersale service?„Äë

#### How does Bizz Call Connect work?

 See more See less

#### How does Bizz Call Connect work?

An example: Peter and Mary are architects and share the same office.

They have a general number which they give out to their customers and use in their communication (business card, website, advertising, etc.). If a customer dials this number, the call will simultaneously arrive on both Peter and Mary‚Äôs landline. If they are on a construction site, the call will be diverted to their mobile phone.

On the construction site when Mary and Peter call a customer from their mobile, it's the landline number that will be displayed. In this way, their mobile phone numbers remain private.

On Tuesdays, Mary is always in the office.

To avoid disturbing Peter, all calls arrive on Mary's landline phone only.

Outside office hours, a welcome message is played back to customers. They can leave any messages on an answering machine.

[Image 7]

Bizz Call Connect

As from ‚Ç¨25 /month + free installation

„Äê31‚Ä†Request a quote„Äë 

## How does the installation work?

### Free installation

A technician will call in at no charge to install the Bizz Call Connect solution and the associated equipment. He will take care of the basic setup and help you familiarize with the phones, the app and the portal.

[Image 8] 

#### Limit your investments and rent IP phones

You don't have to invest in hardware. You can rent IP phones from Proximus.

„Äê32‚Ä† Discover the phones Opens a new window „Äë 

 Conditions 

  * „Äê33‚Ä† General conditions „Äë 
  * „Äê34‚Ä† Promotion conditions „Äë

A Proximus VDSL2 Internet line is required to use Bizz Call Connect.

metadata.text:
* Answer a call
  * Call someone in your organization

„Äê32‚Ä† Call people Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Advanced calling options 

Don't use native call settings in the Webex App. Proximus implemented dedicated advanced calls settings within the Webex App to allow automatic synchronisation¬† with the Call Connect Portal.  
To go to this section, follow these steps: 

  1. Click on your initials on the top left side of the screen.  
[Image 0]
  2. Click on Settings  
[Image 1]
  3. Click on Calling  
[Image 2]
  4. Click on Advanced call settings  
[Image 3]

Now you can learn how to:

  * Do not disturb : This activates automatic call forwarding to your voice mail, if it's activated. If voice mail isn't activated, your caller will hear a busy tone. To turn this option on or off in the Webex App. Your choice is automatically saved.
  * Call Forwarding : There are different types of Call Forwarding: 
    * Always Forwarding: all your calls are forwarded to a specified number. This call forwarding always has priority over other call forwarding you have set.
    * No Answer Forwarding: when you don't pick up, your calls are forwarded to a specified number. You can choose the number of rings before a call is forwarded.
    * Busy Forwarding: when your line is busy, your calls are forwarded to a specified number.
In each of the above cases, you can also choose to forward your calls to your voicemail. If you forward calls to your voicemail, you cannot forward them to a specific number at the same time.  
To turn any of these options on or off in the Webex App: 
    1. Choose the desired option.
    2. Enter the phone number to which you want to forward your calls (e.g. 012123456). If you want to forward calls to your voicemail, do not enter a number. Your choice is automatically saved.
  * Simultaneous ringing : Selective Simultaneous Ring ensures that certain phones ring at the same time. You can choose which phone numbers this applies to. If you don't want your employees' phones to start ringing when they're on a call, check Do not ring if on call.
  * Sequential ringing : Selective Sequential Ring ensures that phones ring in a specific order. You can draw up a list with your own order.
  * Remote office : This service allows you to link any number, even if not hosted on our network and all the calls will be forwarded to this destination. Enter a number first. Then To turn this option on or off in the Webex App:¬†  
Check or uncheck Active to turn the option on or off.
  * Call waiting : This allows you to take a second call while you're on the line with another caller.¬†  
To turn this option on or off in the Webex App:¬†Check or uncheck Active to turn the option on or off.
  * Block my caller ID : This hides your phone number when you call someone (secret number).¬†  
To turn this option on or off in the Webex App: Check or uncheck Active to turn the option on or off.

* * *

With Webex Messaging, connect in real-time or any other time with advanced features for group messaging, file-sharing, whiteboarding, and more.

  * Filter important messages
  * Get to your favourite spaces more quickly
  * Filter your spaces and content
  * Get back to your drafts
  * Hide less important spaces
  * Follows conversations more easily with threads

„Äê34‚Ä† Organize your messages Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Share your content 

Learn how to:

  * Share Animated GIFs
  * Share Files with Others
  * Share Your Screen While Messaging
  * Share Files from Microsoft OneDrive or SharePoint Online
  * Share Files from Box
  * Create a Whiteboard in a Space

„Äê35‚Ä† Share your content Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

* * *

### Meet

With Webex Meeting, stay connected with video conferencing that‚Äôs engaging, intelligent, and inclusive.

Set up your meeting preferences 

Learn how to: 

  * Change your audio settings
  * Change your video settings
  * Turn off notifications for incoming calls

„Äê36‚Ä† Set up your meeting preferences Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Join meetings 

Learn how to: 

  * Join a Webex Meeting
  * Join a meeting from your Webex site
  * Register for a Webex Meeting or Event
  * Use a virtual background in the Webex Meetings suite

„Äê37‚Ä† Join meetings Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Schedule meetings 

Learn how to: 

  * Start a personal Room meeting
  * Start a meeting from a¬† space
  * Schedule a meeting from a space
  * Schedule a meeting using @webex or @meet

„Äê38‚Ä† Schedule meetings Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Connect to audio and video 

Learn how to: 

  * Mute or unmute other people in a meeting
  * Use a virtual or blurred background in calls and meetings

„Äê39‚Ä† Connect to audio and video Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Share content 

Learn how to: 

  * Share your screen or application in a meeting

„Äê35‚Ä† Share content Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

* * *

### Integrate Webex app to Microsoft Outlook

Improve the collaboration with your contacts by connecting your Microsoft Outlook account to the Webex application.

Connect Microsoft Outlook account to Webex app 

If you use a free Webex account, you can enable the integration in the settings if you are the administrator of your computer. If you use a paid Webex account (Webex for Call Connect, included in your Call Connect license), your administrator must enable the integration for you.

  * View the presence status of your contacts

* * *

„Äê30‚Ä†Do you need the aftersale service?„Äë

#### How does Bizz Call Connect work?

 See more See less

#### How does Bizz Call Connect work?

An example: Peter and Mary are architects and share the same office.

They have a general number which they give out to their customers and use in their communication (business card, website, advertising, etc.). If a customer dials this number, the call will simultaneously arrive on both Peter and Mary‚Äôs landline. If they are on a construction site, the call will be diverted to their mobile phone.

On the construction site when Mary and Peter call a customer from their mobile, it's the landline number that will be displayed. In this way, their mobile phone numbers remain private.

On Tuesdays, Mary is always in the office.

To avoid disturbing Peter, all calls arrive on Mary's landline phone only.

Outside office hours, a welcome message is played back to customers. They can leave any messages on an answering machine.

[Image 7]

Bizz Call Connect

As from ‚Ç¨25 /month + free installation

„Äê31‚Ä†Request a quote„Äë

### Free installation

A technician will call in at no charge to install the Bizz Call Connect solution and the associated equipment. He will take care of the basic setup and help you familiarize with the phones, the app and the portal.

[Image 8] 

#### Limit your investments and rent IP phones

You don't have to invest in hardware. You can rent IP phones from Proximus.

#### How does Bizz Call Connect work?

 See more See less

#### How does Bizz Call Connect work?

An example: Peter and Mary are architects and share the same office.

They have a general number which they give out to their customers and use in their communication (business card, website, advertising, etc.). If a customer dials this number, the call will simultaneously arrive on both Peter and Mary‚Äôs landline. If they are on a construction site, the call will be diverted to their mobile phone.

On the construction site when Mary and Peter call a customer from their mobile, it's the landline number that will be displayed. In this way, their mobile phone numbers remain private.

On Tuesdays, Mary is always in the office.

To avoid disturbing Peter, all calls arrive on Mary's landline phone only.

Outside office hours, a welcome message is played back to customers. They can leave any messages on an answering machine.

[Image 7]

content_references.title: Use the Webex app for Call Connect | Proximus
content_references.snippet:
* Answer a call
  * Call someone in your organization

„Äê32‚Ä† Call people Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Advanced calling options 

Don't use native call settings in the Webex App. Proximus implemented dedicated advanced calls settings within the Webex App to allow automatic synchronisation¬† with the Call Connect Portal.  
To go to this section, follow these steps: 

  1. Click on your initials on the top left side of the screen.  
[Image 0]
  2. Click on Settings  
[Image 1]
  3. Click on Calling  
[Image 2]
  4. Click on Advanced call settings  
[Image 3]

Now you can learn how to:

  * Do not disturb : This activates automatic call forwarding to your voice mail, if it's activated. If voice mail isn't activated, your caller will hear a busy tone. To turn this option on or off in the Webex App. Your choice is automatically saved.
  * Call Forwarding : There are different types of Call Forwarding: 
    * Always Forwarding: all your calls are forwarded to a specified number. This call forwarding always has priority over other call forwarding you have set.
    * No Answer Forwarding: when you don't pick up, your calls are forwarded to a specified number. You can choose the number of rings before a call is forwarded.
    * Busy Forwarding: when your line is busy, your calls are forwarded to a specified number.
In each of the above cases, you can also choose to forward your calls to your voicemail. If you forward calls to your voicemail, you cannot forward them to a specific number at the same time.  
To turn any of these options on or off in the Webex App: 
    1. Choose the desired option.
    2. Enter the phone number to which you want to forward your calls (e.g. 012123456). If you want to forward calls to your voicemail, do not enter a number. Your choice is automatically saved.
  * Simultaneous ringing : Selective Simultaneous Ring ensures that certain phones ring at the same time. You can choose which phone numbers this applies to. If you don't want your employees' phones to start ringing when they're on a call, check Do not ring if on call.
  * Sequential ringing : Selective Sequential Ring ensures that phones ring in a specific order. You can draw up a list with your own order.
  * Remote office : This service allows you to link any number, even if not hosted on our network and all the calls will be forwarded to this destination. Enter a number first. Then To turn this option on or off in the Webex App:¬†  
Check or uncheck Active to turn the option on or off.
  * Call waiting : This allows you to take a second call while you're on the line with another caller.¬†  
To turn this option on or off in the Webex App:¬†Check or uncheck Active to turn the option on or off.
  * Block my caller ID : This hides your phone number when you call someone (secret number).¬†  
To turn this option on or off in the Webex App: Check or uncheck Active to turn the option on or off.

content_references.snippet:
„Äê28‚Ä† Set up calling preferences Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Call people 

Learn how to: 

  * Make audio and video calls¬†
  * Answer a call
  * Call someone in your organization

„Äê29‚Ä† Call people Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Advanced calling options 

Don't use native call settings in the Webex App. Proximus implemented dedicated advanced calls settings within the Webex App to allow automatic synchronisation¬† with the Call Connect Portal.  
To go to this section, follow these steps: 

  1. Tap your initials on the top left side of the screen.  
[Image 0]
  2. Tap Settings  
[Image 1]
  3. Tap Calling  
[Image 2]
  4. Tap Advanced call settings  
[Image 3]

Now you can learn how to:

  * Do not disturb : This activates automatic call forwarding to your voice mail, if it's activated. If voice mail isn't activated, your caller will hear a busy tone. To turn this option on or off in the Webex App. Your choice is automatically saved.
  * Call Forwarding : There are different types of Call Forwarding: 
    * Always Forwarding: all your calls are forwarded to a specified number. This call forwarding always has priority over other call forwarding you have set.
    * No Answer Forwarding: when you don't pick up, your calls are forwarded to a specified number. You can choose the number of rings before a call is forwarded.
    * Busy Forwarding: when your line is busy, your calls are forwarded to a specified number.
In each of the above cases, you can also choose to forward your calls to your voicemail. If you forward calls to your voicemail, you cannot forward them to a specific number at the same time.  
To turn any of these options on or off in the Webex App: 
    1. Choose the desired option.
    2. Enter the phone number to which you want to forward your calls (e.g. 012123456). If you want to forward calls to your voicemail, do not enter a number. Your choice is automatically saved.
  * Simultaneous ringing : Selective Simultaneous Ring ensures that certain phones ring at the same time. You can choose which phone numbers this applies to. If you don't want your employees' phones to start ringing when they're on a call, check Do not ring if on call.
  * Sequential ringing : Selective Sequential Ring ensures that phones ring in a specific order. You can draw up a list with your own order.
  * Remote office : This service allows you to link any number, even if not hosted on our network and all the calls will be forwarded to this destination. Enter a number first. Then To turn this option on or off in the Webex App:¬†  
Check or uncheck Active to turn the option on or off.
  * Call waiting : This allows you to take a second call while you're on the line with another caller.¬†  
To turn this option on or off in the Webex App:¬†Check or uncheck Active to turn the option on or off.
  * Block my caller ID : This hides your phone number when you call someone (secret number).¬†  
To turn this option on or off in the Webex App: Check or uncheck Active to turn the option on or off.

* * *

### Message

With Webex Messaging, connect in real-time or any other time with advanced features for group messaging, file-sharing, whiteboarding, and more.

Send messages 

Learn how to:

  * Read a message
  * Send a message
  * Get back to your drafts
  * Forward messages
  * Get everyone's attention in a space
  * Quotes and threads
  * Format messages
  * Add fun to your messages with emojis
  * Delete messages and files

„Äê30‚Ä† Send message Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Organize your messages 

Learn how to:

  * Find people, spaces, messages, files and devices
  * Filter your @ mentions
  * Filter important messages
  * Get to your favourite spaces more quickly
  * Filter your spaces and content
  * Get back to your drafts
  * Hide less important spaces
  * Follows conversations more easily with threads

„Äê31‚Ä† Organize your messages Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Share your content 

Learn how to:

  * Share Animated GIFs
  * Share Files with Others
  * Share Your Screen While Messaging
  * Share Files from Microsoft OneDrive or SharePoint Online
  * Share Files from Box
  * Create a Whiteboard in a Space

„Äê32‚Ä† Share your content Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

* * *

### Meet

With Webex Meeting, stay connected with video conferencing that‚Äôs engaging, intelligent, and inclusive.

Set up your meeting preferences 

Learn how to: 

  * Change your audio settings
  * Change your video settings
  * Turn off notifications for incoming calls

„Äê33‚Ä† Set up your meeting preferences Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Join meetings 

Learn how to: 

  * Join a Webex Meeting
  * Join a meeting from your Webex site
  * Register for a Webex Meeting or Event
  * Use a virtual background in the Webex Meetings suite

„Äê34‚Ä† Join meetings Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Connect to audio and video 

Learn how to: 

  * Mute or unmute other people in a meeting
  * Use a virtual or blurred background in calls and meetings

„Äê35‚Ä† Connect to audio and video Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

Share content 

Learn how to: 

  * Share your screen or application in a meeting

„Äê32‚Ä† Share content Opens a new window ‚Ä†help.webex.com„Äë 

* * *

### Integrate Webex app to Microsoft Outlook

Improve the collaboration with your contacts by connecting your Microsoft Outlook account to the Webex application.

Connect Microsoft Outlook account to Webex app 

If you use a free Webex account, you can enable the integration in the settings if you are the administrator of your computer. If you use a paid Webex account (Webex for Call Connect, included in your Call Connect license), your administrator must enable the integration for you.

  * View the presence status of your contacts
  * Call your contacts
  * Send your contacts an instant message
  * Shedule and join a Webex meeting

Ok donc ma coll√®gue avait, in fine, une bonne intuition sur la pertinence de creuser cette piste d'offre chez Proximus.
Juste pour terminer. Si √† l'avenir nous souhaitions quand m√™me utiliser des solutions auto-h√©berg√©es et moins cher voir gratuite. Existe-t-il d'autre FAI que Proximus plus adapt√© √† ce genre de demande particuli√®re et/ou particuli√®rement adapt√©e aux asbl fan de solutions open-source alternatives ?

Oui, ta coll√®gue avait effectivement une bonne intuition avec **Bizz Call Connect** de Proximus, car cela r√©pond bien aux besoins imm√©diats sans la complexit√© technique d'un syst√®me auto-h√©berg√©.

### Alternatives pour l'avenir :

Si tu envisages de migrer vers des solutions **auto-h√©berg√©es** ou des alternatives plus √©conomiques √† l'avenir, voici quelques suggestions de **fournisseurs d'acc√®s internet (FAI)** en Belgique qui pourraient √™tre plus flexibles et ouverts aux solutions open-source, notamment pour les asbl et les structures √† but non lucratif :

1. **EDPnet** :
   - **EDPnet** est une alternative int√©ressante √† Proximus, souvent moins ch√®re. Ce FAI est reconnu pour son approche plus technique et sa flexibilit√© avec des services comme les **SIP Trunks** et des solutions plus adapt√©es aux besoins open-source.
   - Ils proposent des **trunks SIP** √† des prix comp√©titifs pour les appels via VoIP, et sont souvent utilis√©s par des entreprises ou associations qui cherchent √† mettre en place leurs propres syst√®mes PBX.
   
2. **OVHcloud** :
   - OVH est un acteur majeur en mati√®re d'h√©bergement et de t√©l√©phonie VoIP. Ils proposent des **SIP Trunks**, des solutions de t√©l√©phonie cloud, ainsi que des services d'h√©bergement de serveurs. Ils sont tr√®s populaires aupr√®s des **asbl** et des utilisateurs de solutions **open-source**.
   - Si tu souhaites h√©berger toi-m√™me des solutions comme **3CX** ou d'autres syst√®mes PBX bas√©s sur Asterisk, OVHcloud est une option tr√®s adapt√©e avec un bon support technique et des prix comp√©titifs.

3. **Scarlet** (filiale de Proximus) :
   - Scarlet est souvent une option plus √©conomique par rapport √† Proximus, m√™me s‚Äôils appartiennent au m√™me groupe. Ils peuvent offrir des solutions internet moins ch√®res tout en ayant acc√®s √† une bonne infrastructure. Ils ne se sp√©cialisent pas dans les solutions open-source, mais leur tarification abordable pourrait te permettre d‚Äôutiliser un **SIP Trunk** tiers avec des solutions auto-h√©berg√©es comme 3CX ou FreePBX.

4. **Nethys/Voo** :
   - Si tu es situ√© dans une r√©gion couverte par Voo, ils pourraient √™tre une alternative int√©ressante. Bien qu'ils ne soient pas sp√©cifiquement orient√©s open-source, tu pourrais envisager de souscrire √† leurs offres internet tout en utilisant un fournisseur de SIP ind√©pendant comme OVH.

### Conclusion :
- Si tu optes pour une solution **auto-h√©berg√©e**, des fournisseurs comme **EDPnet** ou **OVHcloud** sont parmi les meilleurs choix en Belgique pour les asbl et les amateurs de solutions open-source.
- **Proximus** reste une bonne option pour des solutions pr√™tes √† l'emploi comme Bizz Call Connect, mais si tu cherches √† r√©duire les co√ªts avec des solutions personnalis√©es √† l'avenir, ces autres FAI offrent une flexibilit√© et un support technique adapt√© √† ce type de configuration.

N'h√©site pas √† explorer ces options en fonction de l'√©volution de tes besoins !
